summary: adds a ring with protection enchantment.
descriptionHtml:
Guardian angel is a new enchantment for rings or amulets.

Whenever your health is low you will get a protection increasing your armor and grants magic negation.

The ring can be found in Whiterun, Dragonsreach on a dresser in the basement.
You can disenchant it and use it on any other ring or amulet.

also on [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=14147]steam workshop[/url]
author: beagle547
